content.description:
This is one of 3 ways to the top of this little, granite spire.  This picks probably the line of least resistance up this small formation up the S side.  Ascend an variable corner with feet on the slab and hands in the corner.  Gain an easier groove above, jump into the notch, and get lowered about 8 ft to a ledge on the N face.  Belay.

Descent is via a simul rappel.

Perhaps a star is generous, but it felt worth the effort, since we were in the area.
content.protection: A big wire, #2, 2.5, 3 Friend sized cams, a blue Alien.  A red Alien and a wide-hands sized cam for the belay on the N side.
content.location: This tiny spire is located just W of Fin City by about 100 ft.
